Producer: Caroline Benjo, Carole Scotta, Barbara Letellier, Simon Arnal
Screenwriter: Severine Bosschem, Emmanuelle Bercot, Romain Compingt
Synopsis: A pneumonologist working in a hospital in France notices a link between suspicious deaths and a state-approved medication used to treat diabetes. Fighting on her own against the system, Franchon manages to break the scandal and reveal the truth.
Title: 150 Milligrams
